Articles.Content: So I booted up steam this morning, and found that KSP was updating! Does anyone else have a 449 MB update?

I'm serious. The only thing I can think of is that something went wrong with my install and Steam is redownloading missing files, but I haven't played KSP for a couple of days. I'll see if i can post a screenshot.

Not unless the last time you fired up Steam was with KSP v0.25 or previous. Of course, missing files may be replaced, but no, 1.0 is not dropping yet.

Think I'll shutter this thread before it attracts a stream of less than helpful posts.

![65161030.jpg](http://www.hisltd.co.uk/images/65161030.jpg)
